tool_description: This API aims at providing retailers access to a combination of artificial intelligence and data to calculate full margin, retail-adjusted, psychological, and other pricing strategies.
name: Retail Pricing Optimizer
title: Retail Pricing Optimizer

api_list.name: ByMarkUp
api_list.description: Returns the raw price, suggested retail price, suggested low cost leader price, and the psychology price computed.

required_parameters.name: TargetMarkupPercentage
required_parameters.description: This is the targeted markup for sales prices.

required_parameters.name: Cost
required_parameters.description: This is the cost of the product which is used to calculate possible prices based on the required markup.

api_list.name: ByMargin
api_list.description: This endpoint allows the calculation of all possible prices by providing the cost and the targeted margin.

required_parameters.name: TargetMarginPercentage
required_parameters.description: This is the expected margin in percentage, it has to be positive.

required_parameters.name: Cost
required_parameters.description: This is the cost of the product, it has to be positive and can be 2 decimal points.

api_list.name: ByMinimumPrice
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates margins, markups, and suggested prices by providing both product cost and a target minimum sales price.

required_parameters.name: MinimumPrice
required_parameters.description: This is the minimum price targeted by the service. All other prices will be based on the minimum price.

required_parameters.name: Cost
required_parameters.description: This is the product cost used to calculate margins and markups.
